overview: Manjot, who belongs to a rich family, meets Sarbi at a wedding ceremony and the two fall for each other. The love affair reaches the marriage stage, but Sarbi`s parents oppose it. Sarbi`s older sister was engaged to a man from a rich family, who later rejected the match. Fearing the same consequences, Sarbi`s family does not accept the proposal. Will Manjot and Sarbi be able to unite their families?
title: Tu Mera Ki Lagda
